attributes.action: ban tv competitions/quizzes which charge extortionate caller rates (eg The Mint)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the problems of gambling debt will be increased more by such easy entry quizzes as are broadcast after midnight on ITV (The Mint) and during afternoons in the commercial breaks. It is a lottery whether you even get to enter after you call on a premium call-line. Such programming should be illegal.
